Your journey from Zürich main station to Baden, on 23.12.16

You take the  InterRegio 2190  from  Zürich main station  departing platform edge  17  towards  Olten  to  Baden .

Your journey starts at  Zürich main station  on  23.12.16  at  22:06 ,  you arrive at  Baden  on platform edge  3  at  22:21 .


Summary

The total journey time is:  15

This connection runs daily.

We wish you a pleasant trip!

All Information, connections and adherence to the timetable are given without guarantee. Please check for possible changes shortly before departure.
